group.label: SEO AI
group.comment: To activate and use the SEO AI module features, please get your OpenAI API key or Google API key. Once you have your API key, please specify it in the 'AI Integration Settings' section.

field.label: Enable
field.comment: Enable the AI features for the administrator. When disabled you will no longer see the “Generate using AI” buttons in product and category form. All previously generated data will still be available.

field.label: Enable for
field.comment: Using this field you can enable or disable the "Generate" functionality for specific entities.

field.label: AI Model
field.comment:
GPT-4 – The most capable general-purpose model. Best for tasks requiring high accuracy, logic, and understanding.
GPT-4 Turbo – Faster and cheaper than GPT-4 with comparable quality. Supports up to 128k tokens context length.
GPT-4o – The latest flagship OpenAI model with improved speed, reasoning, and multi-modal support. Ideal for content generation.
GPT-4.1 / 4.1-nano / 4.1-mini – Experimental successors of GPT-4o with varying performance profiles. Choose based on your speed and cost needs.
GPT-3.5 Turbo – A highly efficient model offering great quality at a lower cost. Perfect for most SEO content generation tasks.
GPT-3.5 Turbo 0125 / 1106 / Instruct – Iterations of GPT-3.5 with improved instruction-following and longer context support (up to 16k tokens).
Text Davinci 003 – A powerful GPT-3 series model, excels at following instructions and generating high-quality text.
Text Ada 001 – Lightweight and low-cost. Best for basic text tasks and quick generation needs.
Note: Model availability may depend on your OpenAI plan and quota.
Gemini 1.5 Pro – Multimodal model optimized for advanced reasoning, long context (up to 2M tokens), and instruction following.
Gemini 1.5 Flash – Fast and efficient sibling of 1.5 Pro. Great for scalable content generation with 1M token context.
Gemini 2.0 Flash – Improved throughput and context length. Suitable for large documents and SEO content.
Gemini 2.0 Flash Lite – Lighter version of Flash 2.0 for faster response and cost efficiency.
Gemini 2.5 Pro Preview / Experimental – Cutting-edge Gemini versions with up to 1M tokens and extended output (up to 65k tokens). Use cautiously.
Gemini 2.5 Flash Preview / Experimental – Ideal for fast generation tasks with modern capabilities and enhanced limits.
Gemini Flash / Flash Lite 001 – Stable releases of Gemini 2.0 generation models from 2025.
Gemini 1.5 Pro 002 / Flash 001 – Improved versions of 1.5 generation, delivering better latency and instruction tuning.
Note: Gemini models require a valid Google API Key in your Google Cloud Console. Availability and performance depend on region and quota.
